title: Nikki Bella cuts a chic figure in studded black dress with her sister Brie out in Los Angeles
text:
It's family time for these two famous sisters.

Retired professional wrestlers Nikki and Brie Bella, 35, stepped out for dinner on Wednesday evening in the Los Angeles neighborhood of Sherman Oaks and brought along some special family members.

Brie was seen heading inside with her husband Daniel Bryan, 38, and their daughter Birdie. Her twin sister Nikki was also spotted looking stylish as she quickly followed behind the family-of-three with her boyfriend Artem Chigvintsev, 37.

Family outing: Retired professional wrestlers Nikki and Brie Bella stepped out for dinner on Wednesday evening in the Los Angeles neighborhood of Sherman Oaks and brought along some special family members including Brie's husband Daniel Bryan and Nikki's boyfriend Artem Chigvintsev

Nikki looked elegant as she wore a black dress that had a slight turtle neck and short sleeves.

The dress was a simple black design with big silver studs around the waist and hem of the skirt.

John Cena's ex wore a pair of black high heels and carried a black clutch at her side as she scurried inside.

Stylish: Brie's dress had a high slit and thin straps and looked gorgeous on the mother-of-one as she complimented the look with a pair of black platform heels

Brie kept her style simple in a white dress with black polka dots.

The dress had a high slit and thin straps and looked gorgeous on the mother-of-one.

She completed the look with a pair of black platform heels as she wore minimal makeup and carried her daughter inside.

Heading out: Brie kept her style simple in a white dress with black polka dots

Back in June, Nikki opened up while on The Tonight Show about her real reasons for leaving the WWE ring.

'For me, I really wanted to go back and fight for the tag titles,' she revealed. 'I've always had my neck issues and after neck surgery, it hasn't been OK. I feel like I needed to get a checkup before we went back for the tag titles.'

'The results came back and I herniated the disc above where I had surgery, I have all this inflammation around the metal and then I have a cyst on my brain,' Nikki continued. 'They were like, 'You're done, no more,' so I didn't get a choice, which sucks.'

Her sister also announced her retirement shortly after giving birth to her little one so she can focus on being a mother.

Sisters: Brie and Nikki Bella spent time at the Highlight Room at the Dream Hotel in Hollywood for the Temptation Island watch party last week
description:
It's family time for these two famous sisters.
Retired professional wrestlers Brie and Nikki Bella stepped out for dinner on Wednesday evening and brought along some family members.
